__prompts__.package_name: Package name (e.g., used as the top-level directory name)
__prompts__.module_name: Module name (must be a valid Python identifier)
__prompts__.plugin_name: Plugin name (often a shortened version of the package name)
__prompts__.plugin_description: Longer description, shown when information is requested on plugin
__prompts__.plugin_short_description: Shorter description, shown when plugin is presented in a list
__prompts__.target_distro: Target distribution (if you're not sure, stick with the default).
